instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan spin, no chime
threads.message:
Cant find any liquid damage.
I know EFI chip was replaced but all was working fine.

When remove RAM there is no beep sound.

Clock chip replaced - same story.
When charger connected there is quarter fan spin, stop and then fan spins all the time.

Any ideas?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan spin, no chime
threads.message:
Change BIOS chip with new, same model.
Charge clean ME dump.

Do you get CPU VCORE?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan spin, no chime
threads.message: NEW BIOS chip and is fixed now.
